name: Little Red Gunner: Demo
description:
This game can be played with a wired gamepad controller(Eg. Xbox 360/PS4). As this is a Demo for a larger game, there may still be some minor bugs not yet found by the developers. If you encounter a game breaking bug, please go to the main menu and restart the level you were on.  Afterwards, feel free to tell us about any bugs or suggestions you have in the comments below as we will be reading them constantly. We hope you enjoy our demo and stay tuned for the final release!

Controls:

PlayStation

Jump - X

Dash - Square

Shoot - R2

Xbox

Jump - A

Dash - X

Shoot - Right Trigger

Keyboard

Move - AD

Jump - W&Space

Dash - LShift

Shoot - Enter

Credits:

Nathaniel Bryant: Narrative Designer,  Lead Level Designer,  Art Designer,  Character Designer, UI Designer,  Music/Sound Designer, Cinematics

Brett Ingram: Lead Programmer,  Lead AI Designer,  Level Designer, Character Designer, UI Designer

Parker Greene: Character Animator, Level Designer, Lead Cinematics, Lead UI Design,  Programmer, AI Designer.
